DOC.brief_summary: This study do identify certain sequence ( pattern ) key gene ( call polymorphism ) may predict response fertility medication . The investigator also determine individual response fertility medication affect pregnancy rate in-vitro fertilization .
DOC.brief_title: Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) Receptor Polymorphisms In-Vitro Fertilization Cycles .
DOC.detailed_description: All IVF patient meet inclusion criterion exclusion criterion ask participate study . Upon consent , blood sample obtain 2 EDTA contain lavender top tube , within 3 month IVF cycle . Genomic DNA extract save genotyping . The Investigators collect data individual 's age , ethnic background , estradiol level day hCG administration , total gonadotropin amount , clinical pregnancy rate , basal FSH level , occurrence OHSS . The Investigators analyze sample patient FSH receptor genotype . Patients compensate $ 75 via check within 6-8 week blood drawn .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 100 woman less 35 year old time signing Informed Consent Form . 2 . Day 3 FSH level less equal 10 mIU/ml estradiol < 70 pg/ml 3 . Day 3 antral follicle count great 10 follicle total . 4 . Couples male factor infertility , tubal factor infertility , unexplained infertility . Exclusion Criteria patient : 1 . Endometriosis 2 . Polycystic ovarian syndrome
